title: Maine Coon
description: Large, fluffy, and gentle cat breed, known for its friendly personality.

title: Siamese
description: Elegant cat with a short coat and striking blue eyes. Very vocal and affectionate.

title: Persian
description: Long-haired and quiet breed with a sweet temperament.

title: Bengal
description: Energetic and exotic-looking cat breed with leopard-like spots.

title: Sphynx
description: Hairless cat known for its warmth and love for attention.

title: Ragdoll
description: Large and calm cat that often goes limp when picked up.

title: British Shorthair
description: Stocky build with plush fur and a calm, independent personality.

title: Russian Blue
description: Short-haired breed with silvery-blue coat and green eyes. Known for its gentle nature.
